<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>+{GlancingHitChanceCurrent}%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit Chance
When you take a <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit, gain <b>{Barrier}</> Barrier, not more than once every <b>{BarrierCDCurrent}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>+{GlancingHitChanceNext}%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit Chance
When you take a <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit, gain <b>{Barrier}</> Barrier, not more than once every <b>{BarrierCDNext}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>
When you take a <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit, heal for <b>{Heal}%</> of the reduced damage.
After using a Movement Skill, gain <b>+{DmgReduction}%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit Damage Reduction.\nDecays by <b>{DecayRate}%</> every second.
